content.rendered:
Delivering technology and a high level of expertise

These subsidiaries bring together engineers with strong expertise in geotechnical, structural, digital, nuclear, oil, gas and renewable energy engineering to deliver solutions with high technological content. Operating in more than 80 countries, they can work as general contractors, joint contractors or subcontractors.

€3,880m revenue

24.027 employees

Main companies

•   Soils: Soletanche Bachy et Menard

•   Structures: Terre Armée et Freyssinet

•   Nuclear: Nuvia

•  Digital services for construction: Sixense

•   Oil and gas: Entrepose Group

•   Environment: VINCI Environnement

excerpt.rendered: Delivering technology and a high level of expertise
